pages.text: All default Geolosys plutons have been overwritten, and this book has been edited to reflect that. If you want to change the ores in this pack, all pluton json's with a dimension name in front are AMI pluton files.

Geolosys comes with a datapack built-in set of ores in its own data pack, organized as such:$(br)$(li)deposits/ores/<ore>$(li)deposits/stones/<stone>$(li)deposits/other/peat (and others)$(br)If you want to prevent any pre-configured ore, just overwrite the file with the exact path and name. You can find more help $(l:https://mods.oitsjustjose.com/Geolosys/#datapacks)here$(/l)!
